term: What does this situation eventually lead to?
content:
most (i think all actually) of the judge commissions have been signed; however, two judges werenâ€™t delivered
one of them was marbury, and he wants to be a judge. but jefferson refused to deliver his thing, so he went to the court and ordered a writ of mandamus
marbury asked the court to order madison to deliver his commission so he could be a judge via a writ of mandamus
